21: וַיִּגְוַ֞ע <sup>1478 </sup> <n>died</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> בָּשָׂ֣ר ׀ <sup>1320 </sup> <n>And all flesh</n> הָרֹמֵ֣שׂ <sup>7430 </sup> <n>that moved</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> הָאָ֗רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> בָּע֤וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>both of fowl</n> וּבַבְּהֵמָה֙ <sup>929 </sup> <n>and of cattle</n> וּבַ֣חַיָּ֔ה <sup>2416 </sup> <n>and of beast</n> וּבְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and every</n> הַשֶּׁ֖רֶץ <sup>8318 </sup> <n>and of every creeping thing</n> הַשֹּׁרֵ֣ץ <sup>8317 </sup> <n>that creepeth</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n> וְכֹ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הָאָדָֽם׃ <sup>120 </sup> <n>and every man</n>
22: כֹּ֡ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>of all</n> אֲשֶׁר֩ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> נִשְׁמַת־ <sup>5397 </sup> <n>was the breath</n> ר֨וּחַ <sup>7307 </sup> <n>of the spirit</n> חַיִּ֜ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of life</n> בְּאַפָּ֗יו <sup>639 </sup> <n>All in whose nostrils</n> מִכֹּ֛ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>whose</n> בֶּחָֽרָבָ֖ה <sup>2724 </sup> <n>of all that [was] in the dry</n> מֵֽתוּ׃ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>[land] died</n>
23: וַיִּ֜מַח <sup>4229 </sup> <n>was destroyed</n> אֶֽת־ <sup>853 </sup> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>every</n> הַיְק֣וּם ׀ <sup>3351 </sup> <n>And every living substance</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <sup>834 </sup> <n>[alive] and they that</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>was upon</n> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>which was upon the face</n> הָֽאֲדָמָ֗ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the ground</n> מֵאָדָ֤ם <sup>120 </sup> <n>both man</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> בְּהֵמָה֙ <sup>929 </sup> <n>and cattle</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> רֶ֙מֶשׂ֙ <sup>7431 </sup> <n>and the creeping things</n> וְעַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>and to</n> ע֣וֹף <sup>5775 </sup> <n>and the fowl</n> הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>of the heaven</n> וַיִּמָּח֖וּ <sup>4229 </sup> <n>and they were destroyed</n> מִן־ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>from</n> הָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>from the earth</n> וַיִשָּׁ֧אֶר <sup>7604 </sup> <n>remained</n> אַךְ־ <sup>389 </sup> <n>only</n> נֹ֛חַ <sup>5146 </sup> <n>and Noah</n> וַֽאֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>after</n> אִתּ֖וֹ <sup>854 </sup> <n>for</n> בַּתֵּבָֽה׃ <sup>8392 </sup> <n>[were] with him in the ark</n>
